name: furniture-saas-monorepo
description: Multi-tenant furniture SaaS monorepo (Next.js + NestJS + Prisma)

scripts.demo:up: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ports=@(4000,4010,3000,3001,3002,3010); foreach($p in $ports){$processId=(Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $p -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique); if($processId){Stop-Process -Id $processId -Force}}; $env:DEMO_MODE='true'; $env:PORT='4010'; Start-Process -NoNewWindow cmd -ArgumentList '/c','pnpm --filter @furniture/api start' -WorkingDirectory 'C:\dev\furniture-shop'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 4; $env:NEXT_PUBLIC_DEMO_MODE='true'; $env:NEXT_PUBLIC_TENANT_ID='furniture-demo'; $env:NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL='http://localhost:4010/api'; $env:PORT='3010'; $env:NODE_ENV='development'; Start-Process -NoNewWindow cmd -ArgumentList '/c','cd apps\web && pnpm dev -p 3010' -WorkingDirectory 'C:\dev\furniture-shop'; Write-Host 'Demo up â†’ Web: http://localhost:3010  |  API: http://localhost:4010/api'"
scripts.deploy:all: pnpm deploy:api && pnpm deploy:web && pnpm deploy:worker
scripts.railway:migrate: pnpx --yes railway run --service api pnpm --filter @furniture/prisma migrate deploy
